channel.title: CVE Feed for Mattermost -- Playbooks Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mattermost -- Playbooks Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-4019|2024-08-03T01:27:54.186Z -- mattermost -- playbooks%20plugin
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability in the Mattermost Playbooks plugin allows an authenticated user to crash the server via multiple large requests to one of the Playbooks API endpoints.
